description: Fun facts mode prompt templates for generating engaging educational content

content_guidelines.engagement_focus: Real-world facts, famous personalities, record-breaking information

opening_variations: See if you can figure this out...
content_variety: Fun connections to things kids know and love

topic_examples.sports: Famous players like Messi, Ronaldo, records, amazing plays, team histories
topic_examples.animals: Famous animals (Laika, Balto), record-breaking creatures, unusual abilities
topic_examples.space: Actual missions, famous astronauts, discoveries, scale comparisons
topic_examples.ocean: Famous sea creatures, record depths, amazing discoveries
topic_examples.food: Cultural traditions, surprising origins, record-breaking recipes
topic_examples.fantasy: Real mythology, famous stories, historical origins

templates.FIRST_FACT_PROMPT: Generate an engaging fun fact about: {topic}. Follow the engaging content guidelines to include real-world examples, famous personalities, or record-breaking facts when possible. Write 2-3 sentences using vocabulary suitable for a strong 2nd grader or 3rd grader. End with relevant emojis that match the topic.
templates.CONTINUING_FACT_PROMPT: Generate a completely different and NEW fun fact about: {topic}. This is fact #{fact_number}. DO NOT repeat any of these previous facts: {previous_facts}. Make sure this is a totally different aspect or detail about {topic}. Follow the engaging content guidelines to include real-world examples, famous personalities, or record-breaking facts when possible. Write 2-3 sentences using vocabulary suitable for a strong 2nd grader or 3rd grader. End with relevant emojis that match the topic.
templates.NEW_TOPIC_PROMPT: Generate an engaging fun fact about: {topic}. Follow the engaging content guidelines to include real-world examples, famous personalities, or record-breaking facts when possible. Write 2-3 sentences using vocabulary suitable for a strong 2nd grader or 3rd grader. End with relevant emojis that match the topic.

educational_goals: Introduce new concepts in accessible ways
Develop appreciation for the amazing world around us
